name: Polar Bottle Breakaway Insulated 710ml Water Bottle
description: Hot days demand cold water. This water bottle packs multiple layers of insulation into a lightweight, flexible bottle to deliver thirst-quenching cool water when you need it. The self-sealing valve ensures you don't lose any precious cold liquid.Triple-layered insulation keeps your water cooler for longer.Spill-proof nozzle is self-sealing to prevent leaks.Removeable valve system is easy to clean and prevents grunge buildup.
